pageContent:
Profile 
With an emphasis on Amisys configuration architecture and best practices, I am passionate 
about creating new approaches to configuration to enable the upmost in efficiency, 
accuracy and design. As a problem solver, I pride myself in continually being able to 
research and analyze every issue start to finish as thoroughly and efficiently as possible. I 
am tenacious and do not give up until I find the root cause of an issue and find the best 
possible resolution every time. As a communicator, I am diligent and thorough when leaving 
a documentation trail regarding any work I do, to leave legacy materials for my peers and 
leaders. 
P R O F E S S I O N A L S U M M A R Y 
 
An extensive professional consulting career spanning 30 years in configuration, architecture 
& design; primarily within the Amisys and Amisys Advance systems. 
 
Worked with dozens of clients across the nation in a variety of configuration and architecture 
roles on projects such as:

& design; primarily within the Amisys and Amisys Advance systems. 
 
Worked with dozens of clients across the nation in a variety of configuration and architecture 
roles on projects such as: 
 
 
 Full Data Conversions to and from Amisys; Providing knowledge across many sub-
systems 
 Improving Existing Benefits Configuration Architecture/Re-configuration projects 
 From the ground up benefit configuration & associated subsystems including 
ARQs, R&C, Enrollment, Pricing, etc. 
 Deep-dive Data Analysis/production failure root cause analysis/resolution at the 
highest BA levels 
 Providing training, knowledge verification and guidance to full time 
configuration staff for benefits and all related subsystems: Authorization 
Required Qualifiers, Membership/Enrollment, Providers/Pricing, Reference & 
Controls, and Claims processing logic overviews to help bridge the knowledge 
gap sometimes missing with FTEs in configuration.

E X P E R I E N C E 
SE N IO R C O N SU L T A NT- A RC H I T EC T / AM I S Y S CO N F I G U RA T I O N EXPERT 
Mediant Health Resources, Phoenix, AZ 
2017 - Present: 
Primary Client: Centene Corp. Medicare, Medicaid, Marketplace Configuration Teams 
R E S P O N S I B I L I T I E S : 
 Project-based activities focused primarily on new product designs relative to complex benefit configuration, creating new architecture to maximize 
efficiency and speed to market, and designing new pathways of configuration in out-of-the-box situations. 
 Served as Amisys expert and architect across all products corporate wide, assisting full time teams in researching production failures and difficult 
configuration change requests when they are unable to find resolution on their own or needed guidance.

configuration change requests when they are unable to find resolution on their own or needed guidance. 
  Provided training and knowledge verification sessions to help evaluate and manage full time resources for leadership. 
S U C C E S S S T O R I E S : 
 Designed, Implemented and served as SME for Centene’s Medicare Ascension plans on a brand new Amisys instance for 2020 Implementation, including 
the rollout of a new Procedure Detail table and collaboration with Med Ops to optimize system efficiency, established naming/priority conventions and 
documentation. 
 Primary architect on all complex Medicare benefit solutions for Vision, Telehealth, FQHC established in 2020, and the new multi-cost share 
arrangements implemented in 2022. Because of the complexity, I created a full comprehensive Benefit Requirement Master Grid for each of these

arrangements implemented in 2022. Because of the complexity, I created a full comprehensive Benefit Requirement Master Grid for each of these 
service categories. These ‘Master Grids’ served as complete pictures of all product requirements, plan information, cost shares, limits, and any other 
detailed configuration that could be used across all teams from requirements phase all the way to testing and prod deployment. This greatly improved 
accuracy, speed to market and traceability regarding requirements from start to finish 
 
I N DE PE N D E NT C O N SU L T A N T- AM I SY S C O NFI G UR A TI O N /A RCH I TEC T 
Primary Client: Connecticare, Inc 
2006-2017 
R E S P O N S I B I L I T I E S : 
 Large Project-based activities focused on new product designs relative to benefit configuration, engineering new products in alignment with current 
architecture approaches and designing new pathways of configuration.

architecture approaches and designing new pathways of configuration. 
 Created custom configuration documentation and designed training sessions for new hires as well as provided knowledge verification and mentorship for 
current full time employees. 
S U C C E S S S T O R I E S : 
 Implemented CCI’s new Medicare plans in 2016/2017, and served as Benefits Lead throughout the project continuing to provide Production support 
in multiple capacities. At the same time assisted with the Amisys Advance system implementation of Release 7 providing expertise, vendor 
feedback/bug submissions and functional testing. 
 Primary architect on the ACA Preventive benefit configuration project; worked on ICD-10 project, and lead Amisys Advance rel. 6 conversion 
configuration testing project 
 Re-engineered existing benefit packages to reduce number of “BP-explode” entries within AMISYS; able to reduce overall volume by 75% within 4 
months.

configuration testing project
